name: Blind Drivers 1
description:
What's Your Favorite Ride? 
You Always Wanted to Prove Yourself  by Showing off Your Skills in the Streets? 
You Think You Can be the "BEST of the COUNTRY"? 
  
Ok, Now Choose Your Favorite Ride, Fit a Sport Rim on it, Change the Interior feel of Your Car and Adjust its Suspension. 
Take a Picture of Your Ride and Share it with Your Friends Online. 
Upgrade the Engine and Prepare Yourself for a breathtaking Competition. Fire Your Engine and Leave the Garage When You Feel Ready. 
NOW IT'S TIME TO OVERTAKE IN HIGHEST SPEED AND RELEASE SOME ADRENALINE!!!!!
Stunning Visuals and Graphics
